npcs.name: Hyacinth Hagglefoot
utterances: Greetings, friend traveler! We have the finest supplies to fill your adventuring needs.
Welcome! What can I help you with?

npcs.name: Executor Adept Sal`ynelle
utterances: I'm sorry but I'm unable to assign you a writ at this time.  Until the city is able to adapt to the new recipes we have to take inventory and cannot accept any new goods.
